CustomField.description: With regard to offers falling into a statutory exception category above, the Offeror has evaluated energy efficiency and conservation improvements and has determined: Cost effective improvements have been identified and are attached to this offer. There are no cost effective improvements. Supporting documentation is attached to this offer.
CustomField.label: Energy Star Statutory Exception

value.label: The agency would remain in the Building it currently occupies.
The Lease would be in a Building of historical, architectural, or cultural significance listed or eligible to be listed on the National Register of Historic Places.
The Lease is for 10,000 RSF or less.
